resources.string: Activate all features and modes, even future version additions
Shoot great panoramas with help of augmented-reality
Remove unwanted objects, combine movement into single photo, select best faces on your photo

version 3.25

 - pause for video added
 - level added
 - panorama improved
 - improved DRO
 - multishots combined
 - sweep panorama added
 - video fixed
 - stability fixes

ABC tips and tricks

If you long press on any of the quick settings on the top bar you get a dropdown list that lets you select and change them to any setting you would like.

Swipe left or write on main scree to see more or less info on the screen - histogram, grids, info controls, top quick settings menu.

Pull down top menu to see all quick settings.
